title: Amazon Pauses Work on 2nd Headquarters in Virginia
description: The delay is the latest reminder that the tech industry’s pandemic-fueled boom has slowed and another indicator of how remote work has changed office-space needs.

title: Amazon Pauses Work on 2nd Headquarters in Virginia
description: The company has been struggling with weak growth and has recently expanded its cost-cutting plans.

title: Why Is TikTok Being Banned?
description: Governments have expressed concerns that TikTok, which is owned by the Chinese company ByteDance, may endanger sensitive user data.

title: Everyone Pivots to A.I., and Bad News for Crypto
description: Is crypto dead? Or only mostly dead?

title: As A.I. Booms, Lawmakers Struggle to Understand the Technology
description: Tech innovations are again racing ahead of Washington’s ability to regulate them, lawmakers and A.I. experts said.
